flavorText:
"Adopt the character of the twisting octopus, which takes on the appearance of the nearby rock. Now follow in this direction, now turn a different hue."
—Theognis, *Elegies 1, 215*
name: Dream Coat
originalText: Caster may change target creature's color to any other color. This ability is played as an interrupt. Limit of one change per turn. Cost to tap, maintain, or use a special ability of target creature remains entirely unchanged.

rulings.text: You can choose any single color or combination of colors. The valid colors are Black, Blue, Green, Red, and White.
The color change does not wear off at end of turn.

text:
Enchant creature
{0}: Enchanted creature becomes the color or colors of your choice. Activate only once each turn.
